representation_information.name: CSV, Comma Separated Values (strict form as described in RFC 4180)
representation_information.description: Simple, delimited data format for rectangular data arrays. Fields/columns are separated by the comma character and records/rows/lines are separated by line breaks. Fields containing special characters (comma, CR, LF, double quotes) must be enclosed in double quotes.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
